content.raw:
I am getting below error while doing the setup,

‌

baila@baila:/etc/docker$ sudo add-apt-repository "deb \[arch=amd64\] [https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu](https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu) $\(lsb\_release -cs\) edge"  
Hit:1 [http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu](http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu) bionic InRelease  
Get:2 [https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu](https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu) bionic InRelease \[64.4 kB\]  
Hit:3 [http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu](http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu) bionic-updates InRelease  
Hit:4 [http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu](http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu) bionic-backports InRelease  
Hit:5 [http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu](http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu) bionic InRelease  
Hit:6 [http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu](http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu) bionic-security InRelease  
Get:7 [https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu](https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu) bionic/edge amd64 Packages \[9,723 B\]  
Err:8 [http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable](http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable) bionic InRelease  
Could not resolve '[packages.osrfoundation.org](http://packages.osrfoundation.org)'  
Fetched 74.2 kB in 30s \(2,469 B/s\)  
Reading package lists... Done  
W: Failed to fetch [http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable/dists/bionic/InRelease](http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable/dists/bionic/InRelease)  Could not resolve '[packages.osrfoundation.org](http://packages.osrfoundation.org)'  
W: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.  
baila@baila:/etc/docker$

‌

any help?
content.html:
I am getting below error while doing the setup,

‌

baila@baila:/etc/docker$ sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(lsb_release -cs) edge"
Hit:1 http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu bionic InRelease
Get:2 https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu bionic InRelease [64.4 kB]
Hit:3 http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu bionic-updates InRelease
Hit:4 http://in.archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu bionic-backports InRelease
Hit:5 http://packages.ros.org/ros/ubuntu bionic InRelease
Hit:6 http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu bionic-security InRelease
Get:7 https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu bionic/edge amd64 Packages [9,723 B]
Err:8 http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable bionic InRelease
Could not resolve 'packages.osrfoundation.org'
Fetched 74.2 kB in 30s (2,469 B/s)
Reading package lists... Done
W: Failed to fetch http://packages.osrfoundation.org/gazebo/ubuntu-stable/dists/bionic/InRelease Could not resolve 'packages.osrfoundation.org'
W: Some index files failed to download. They have been ignored, or old ones used instead.
baila@baila:/etc/docker$

‌

any help?
